title: PowerBuilder 6.0 Questions & Answers
text: Demand for PowerBuilder programmers, with the potential they offer for rapid application development, continues to soar. If you'd like to learn PowerBuilder--or enhance your skills-- this book is for you. Its hands-on approach will show you how to write real code. Each section takes a specific

topic and answers commonly asked questions in an easy-to-understand, conversational manner. It then shows you how the same technique can be used over and over again to decrease your overall code-writing time.
